title: Heavenly Home
verses:
Breth-ren, while we so-journ here,
Foes we have, but we've a Friend,

Fight we must, but should not fear;
One that loves us to the end; Forward,then,with
cour-age go, Long we shall not dwell below; Soon the
joy-ful news will come, "Child, your Father calls, Come home."

metadata.musical_notation: Present with treble and bass clef
metadata.theological_significance: Encourages believers in spiritual warfare with promise of heavenly home
